name: Fight Club 2
summary: Set ten years after the climatic ending of Fight Club, Part Two's story will be told from the restrained perspective of Tyler Durden as he souls in the subconscious of the Narrator (or Jack). The Narrator continues his dysfunctional relationship with Marla and has fallen into the mundane routine of society until - surprise, surprise - Tyler re-emerges to cause chaos.
info:
• 中文名: 搏击俱乐部2
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 发售日: 2015年5月
  • 作者: Chuck Palahniuk
  • 作画: Cameron Stewart
